Mon pere... Gah French 1 isn't that good. xD

My Dad asked me what "L'Enfant Suavage" was. 

I told him "The Savage Infant" ... That's it right? I r gud at Francais.

Most translations are "The Wild Child".
Savage in english is more related to violence than in french, where it just means from nature.

And enfant =/= infant
